title: Learn-cation Breathes New Life into Rural Jeju (25.05.21.) KCTV Jeju English News

tasks.task: Understanding the Learncation concept and its impact on rural revitalization.
subtasks: Learning about the collaboration between Gyeonghi University and local communities.
Observing the social innovation semester project in Shenheung-ni village.
Examining the development of local brands using regional specialties.
Analyzing the planning of tourism content for rural revitalization.
Noting the revitalization of once-quiet villages through student involvement.
Recognizing the role of university-community partnerships in urban regeneration.
Considering the potential of the Learncation model as a sustainable solution for regional depopulation.
